text: Chéngshì de jūmín de nì chǎn, fán zhēnzhǔ shōu guī shǐzhě de, dōu guīzhēnzhǔ, shǐzhě, zhìqīn, gū'ér, pínmín hé lǚkè, yǐmiǎn nàxiē nì chǎn, chéngwéi zài nǐmen zhōng fùháo zhī jiān zhōuzhuǎn de dōngxī. Fán shǐzhě gěi nǐmen de, nǐmen dōu yīngdāng jiēshòu; fán shǐzhě jìnzhǐ nǐmen de, nǐmen dōu yīngdāng jièchú. Nǐmen yīngdāng jìngwèi zhēnzhǔ, zhēnzhǔ què shì xíngfá yánlì de.
